name: Garlic Butter Steak with Parmesan Cheese Sauce
ingredients: 1 lb (450g) sirloin steak, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipe.name: Season Steak
recipe.description: Season steak bites with salt and pepper.

recipe.name: Melt Butter
recipe.description: In a skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat.

recipe.name: Cook Steak Bites
recipe.description: Add steak bites and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes.

recipe.name: Remove Steak Bites
recipe.description: Remove steak from the skillet and set aside.

recipe.name: Add Minced Garlic
recipe.description: In the same skillet, add minced garlic and saut√© until fragrant.

recipe.name: Pour Beef Broth
recipe.description: Pour in beef broth, scraping the bottom of the skillet to release browned bits.

recipe.name: Stir Sauces
recipe.description: Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Simmer until sauce thickens.

recipe.name: Add Steak
recipe.description: Return steak to the skillet, coating in the sauce.

recipe.name: Garnish
recipe.description: Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
